content: **drops crocheted top and cardigan in muskat** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ see the catch of the day top pattern here 1 ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ **sizes** s - m - l - xl - xxl finished measurements bust 84-94-102-112-120 cm 33 - 37 - 40-1/8 - 44 - 47 25 hem 76-84-94-102-112 cm 29-7/8 - 33 - 37 - 40-1/8 - 44 **materials** drops muskat from garnstudio 100% mercerized egyptian cotton 50 g /100 m /109 yards 300-350-350-400-450 gr nr 18 white drops 4 5 mm us g crochet hook or size needed to obtain correct gauge 5 drops silver buttons nr 534 crochet gauge 4 5 chain-loops x 10 row = 10 x 10 cm 1 https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/82-6-b-cath-of-the-day-top
